response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to both of us. Given its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to a fair agreement. I kindly propose to sell the product to you for $750,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while maximizing the value for both parties involved. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you require any additional information to make a decision.", "product_price": 750000}
